summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates Amazon Kinesis functionality using a mocked AWS environment. It covers stream creation, shard management, record retrieval, tagging, retention settings, encryption, enhanced monitoring, consumer handling, CloudFormation lifecycle actions, and data size limits.
business_intent: Ensure that applications interacting with Kinesis behave correctly across all core features and edge cases, providing confidence that stream operations, security settings, monitoring, and infrastructure-as-code integrations function as expected before deployment to production.
